attributes.action: Make mounjaro free to women with Lipedema
attributes.background: Make the medication Mounjaro available on the NHS for women diagnosed with Lipedema, a chronic inflammatory disease. Lipedema is not obesity and does not respond to diet or exercise. NHS access would prevent disability and support working women.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Fund free access to weight loss meds for disabled people & lipoedema sufferers" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/740726
